          <title>
            <string language="es">La Atmósfera y su estructura</string>
            <string language="en">The atmosphere and its structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Atmosphäre und seine Struktur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'atmosphère et sa structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A atmosfera e sua estrutura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'atmosfera e la relativa struttura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ατμόσφαιρα και η δομή του</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica qué es la Atmósfera y su estructura, atendiendo a los criterios de composición y de características físicas.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining what the atmosphere is, using the criteria of its composition and physical characteristics.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geología</string>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Atmósfera</string>
            <string language="en">Atmosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Themaerklären was die Atmosphäre ist mit den 
Kriterien seines Aufbaus und körperlichen Eigenschaften.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expliquer de sujet ce qui est l'atmosphère, en 
utilisant les critères de sa composition et caractéristiques 
physiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explicação do tópico o que a atmosfera é, 
usando os critérios de suas composição e características físicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spiegazione di soggetto che cosa l'atmosfera è, 
usando i test di verifica della relative composizione e 
caratteristiche fisiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί τι η ατμόσφαιρα είναι, 
χρησιμοποιώντας τα κριτήρια της σύνθεσης και των φυσικών 
χαρακτηριστικών της.</string>
          </description>
